Before you use the tool, make sure you have a functional brain.

IF YOU DO NOT HAVE PROXIES, DISABLE THE CONFIG PROXY OPTION BY SETTING THE VARIABLE TO: False

Put your proxies in the format ip:port or user:pass@ip:port.

IF YOU WANT NUKER TO WORK WITH PROXIES, DO NOT USE FREE PROXIES.

Webshare, Proxies.fo, Proxies.gg, and proxyscrape.com (paid) are the best paid proxy providers.
